list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add pricing fields and columns for product sheet
Introduced new fields `ewfdirectPrice`, `ewfdirectManualPrice`, and `promotion` to support additional pricing details. Updated the ProductSheet table to include corresponding columns and enhanced mapping functions to handle these new fields.

task.summary: Default task

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Update dependencies, add Babel config, and adjust CI workflow
Added `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` and updated `axios` to version 1.8.2. Introduced a `.babelrc` file for Babel configuration. Adjusted CI workflow to include `run-tests` as a dependency for the `generate-env` job.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Refactor Babel configuration and cleanup package.json.
Moved `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` from dependencies to Babel plugins in `babel.config.js` to streamline configuration. Removed unnecessary dependency from package.json and updated associated files for consistency.

Remove Babel configuration file
The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.

Remove Babel configuration file
The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.
change node version
change node version

Update dependencies and Jest configuration for compatibility
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to version 7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" to align with the new test framework updates. Adjusted Jest configuration to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. This ensures improved compatibility and stability with the latest library versions.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

Remove unused npm scripts and update workspace metadata
Removed unused `lint` and `lint:fix` scripts from `package.json` for a cleaner build configuration. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes in local tasks and metadata, ensuring accurate tracking of recent edits and project updates. These adjustments improve project organization and align with current workflows.

Remove unused code and improve error handling across components
Cleaned up unused states, imports, and functions for better readability and performance. Enhanced error handling in multiple components to display meaningful messages. Refactored role-fetching logic and fixed minor dependency issues in React hooks.

Simplify eslint rules and enhance error handling.
Replaced `eslintConfig` extends with targeted rules for better maintainability. Cleaned up unused code and improved error handling across components, ensuring better readability, performance, and meaningful feedback in UI interactions.

Simplify eslint rules and enhance error handling.
Replaced `eslintConfig` extends with targeted rules for better maintainability. Cleaned up unused code and improved error handling across components, ensuring better readability, performance, and meaningful feedback in UI interactions.

Simplify eslint rules and enhance error handling.
Replaced `eslintConfig` extends with targeted rules for better maintainability. Cleaned up unused code and improved error handling across components, ensuring better readability, performance, and meaningful feedback in UI interactions.

Simplify eslint rules and enhance error handling.
Replaced `eslintConfig` extends with targeted rules for better maintainability. Cleaned up unused code and improved error handling across components, ensuring better readability, performance, and meaningful feedback in UI interactions.

Simplify eslint rules and enhance error handling.
Replaced `eslintConfig` extends with targeted rules for better maintainability. Cleaned up unused code and improved error handling across components, ensuring better readability, performance, and meaningful feedback in UI interactions.

Update workspace and tasks metadata in `.idea` and workflows
Removed outdated task entries and adjusted local tasks counter for consistency in `.idea/workspace.xml`. Minor formatting update in `.github/workflows/build.yml`.

Refactor type usage and enhance error handling.
Updated type definitions for `OrderListResponseDto` and replaced `any` with proper types in several components to improve type safety. Optimized error handling in `SignIn` and `Orders` components. Removed unused state and properties for cleaner, more maintainable code.

Refactor type handling and clean up unused state
Replaced `any` with specific types for better type safety and readability across multiple components. Removed unused error state in `PInventory` and constant reassignment in `PutAwayLPN`. Simplified import paths and fixed redundant typing in error handling logic.

Refactor types and update SSH key reference in workflows
Improved type safety by replacing `any` with specific types and cleaning up unused states in multiple components. Simplified import paths and optimized error handling logic for better maintainability. Updated GitHub Actions workflow to use `SSH_PRIVATE_KEY` for deployment.

Refactor types and update SSH key reference in workflows
Improved type safety by replacing `any` with specific types and cleaning up unused states in multiple components. Simplified import paths and optimized error handling logic for better maintainability. Updated GitHub Actions workflow to use `SSH_PRIVATE_KEY` for deployment.

Refactor types and update GitHub Actions for SSH deployment
Replaced `any` with specific types and cleaned up unused states to enhance type safety and maintainability. Updated GitHub Actions workflow to use `SSH_PRIVATE_KEY` for secure VPS deployment and simplified related scripts. Added a task for testing SSH connectivity and optimized PM2 setup for smoother deployments.

Refactor types and update GitHub Actions for SSH deployment
Replaced `any` with specific types and cleaned up unused states to enhance type safety and maintainability. Updated GitHub Actions workflow to use `SSH_PRIVATE_KEY` for secure VPS deployment and simplified related scripts. Added a task for testing SSH connectivity and optimized PM2 setup for smoother deployments

Refactor types and update GitHub Actions for SSH deployment
Replaced `any` with specific types and cleaned up unused states to enhance type safety and maintainability. Updated GitHub Actions workflow to use `SSH_PRIVATE_KEY` for secure VPS deployment and simplified related scripts. Added a task for testing SSH connectivity and optimized PM2 setup for smoother deployments

Add "Count by Location" option to AppSidebar menu
This update introduces a new sub-item "Count by Location" under the "Count & Search" menu in the sidebar. It follows the same path as "Count by SKU" and is non-pro and active by default.

Add "Count by Location" option to AppSidebar menu
This update introduces a new sub-item "Count by Location" under the "Count & Search" menu in the sidebar. It follows the same path as "Count by SKU" and is non-pro and active by default.

Update script configuration in build workflow
Replaced 'npx serve' with 'serve' to streamline execution and avoid dependency on npx. This ensures better reliability and alignment with the deployment environment.

Refactor LPN module imports and add EditLPN functionality
Updated import paths for cleaner structure and added a new EditLPN modal to enable inline LPN editing. Improved UI interaction by enabling double-click to edit and adjusted button positions for better usability.

Refactor LPN module imports and add EditLPN functionality
Updated import paths for cleaner structure and added a new EditLPN modal to enable inline LPN editing. Improved UI interaction by enabling double-click to edit and adjusted button positions for better usability.

Add LPN edit functionality with enhanced component filtering
Implemented LPN editing capabilities, including input debouncing and component filtering for better SKU handling. Enhanced print label utility to support changes in LPN properties. Adjusted layout and removed unused code for improved readability and performance.

Add LPN edit functionality with enhanced component filtering
Implemented LPN editing capabilities, including input debouncing and component filtering for better SKU handling. Enhanced print label utility to support changes in LPN properties. Adjusted layout and removed unused code for improved readability and performance.

Implemented LPN editing capabilities, including input debouncing and component filtering for better SKU handling. Enhanced print label utility to support changes in LPN properties. Adjusted layout and removed unused code for improved readability and performance.

Add LPN edit functionality with enhanced component filtering
Implemented LPN editing capabilities, including input debouncing and component filtering for better SKU handling. Enhanced print label utility to support changes in LPN properties. Adjusted layout and removed unused code for improved readability and performance.

Add pricing fields and columns for product sheet
Introduced new fields `ewfdirectPrice`, `ewfdirectManualPrice`, and `promotion` to support additional pricing details. Updated the ProductSheet table to include corresponding columns and enhanced mapping functions to handle these new fields.

MESSAGE.value:
Update GitHub Actions to use v4 of artifact actions
Upgraded `actions/download-artifact` and `actions/upload-artifact` from v3 to v4 in the workflow file. This ensures compatibility with the latest features and improvements in these actions.

Update artifact paths in GitHub Actions workflow
Modified the upload and download artifact paths to explicitly handle the `.env` file. This change ensures the correct environment file is transferred during the CI/CD process. No other workflow steps were affected.

Update CI workflow to streamline .env management and dependencies
Reorganized .env generation by integrating it directly into relevant steps and added directory content verification for debugging. Adjusted build dependencies to include linting and tests, ensuring pre-build checks are complete. Enhanced artifact handling for better workflow clarity and reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Update dependencies, add Babel config, and adjust CI workflow
Added `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` and updated `axios` to version 1.8.2. Introduced a `.babelrc` file for Babel configuration. Adjusted CI workflow to include `run-tests` as a dependency for the `generate-env` job.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Refactor Babel configuration and cleanup package.json.
Moved `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` from dependencies to Babel plugins in `babel.config.js` to streamline configuration. Removed unnecessary dependency from package.json and updated associated files for consistency.

Remove Babel configuration file
The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.

option.value:
Add pricing fields and columns for product sheet
Introduced new fields `ewfdirectPrice`, `ewfdirectManualPrice`, and `promotion` to support additional pricing details. Updated the ProductSheet table to include corresponding columns and enhanced mapping functions to handle these new fields.
